entries.title: Bitcoin Price Rallies to Recoup Losses Since FTX Collapse
entries.description: Investors have pushed the cryptocurrency above $21,000, and other digital tokens have risen as well.

entries.title: Microsoft to Lay Off 10,000 Workers as It Looks to Trim Costs
entries.description: The job cuts, which amount to less than 5 percent of the company’s work force, are its largest in roughly eight years.

entries.title: Can We Talk About How We Talk About the Weather?
entries.description: When the barometer drops, the hyperbole rises, and meteorologists aren’t happy about it.

entries.title: How the Netherlands Is Taming Big Tech
entries.description: Dutch privacy negotiators have spurred major changes at Google, Microsoft and Zoom, using a landmark European data protection law as a lever.

entries.title: ‘Polar Vortex’ Got You Baffled? Try This Extreme-Weather Guide
entries.description: A handy explanation of some of the newer climatological verbiage.
